meanings.definition: The state of being an outsider or not belonging to a particular group or community.
meanings.sent1: Her outsidernesses made it hard for her to join the club.
meanings.sent2: The outsidernesses of the new student was evident in the lunchroom.
meanings.sent3: His outsidernesses at the party led to some awkward moments.
meanings.sent4: The outsidernesses she felt in the big city overwhelmed her.
meanings.sent5: The outsidernesses of the stray cat touched everyone's hearts.

meanings.definition: The quality or condition of being on the outside or exterior of something.
meanings.sent1: The outsidernesses of the house was noticeable from the street.
meanings.sent2: He admired the outsidernesses of the old castle.
meanings.sent3: The outsidernesses of the treehouse made it feel like a secret hideout.
meanings.sent4: The outsidernesses of the mountain was breathtaking from afar.
meanings.sent5: The outsidernesses of the island made it a perfect escape.
